name: The Poossessor
description:
PLEASE READ HOW TO PLAY BEFORE PLAYING :

You are the Poossessor and you must protect the Omniturd, while also using it to protect you. There are two types of obstacles. The first type (black poo pillar with green snot) can only hurt the Omniturd (the turd sprite on the far left) and has no affect on The Poossessor.  The second type (Brown poo pillar with green snot on its sides, can only hurt The Poossessor and has no affect on the Omniturd). Fire LMB projectiles at the Omniturd to  make it bounce up through the gap of his obstacles, press Q to switch the projectile on LMB to a higher bounce projectile, and press Q again to switch back (green projectile is for low jump, purple projectile is for high jump). Press RMB to fire the Omniturd projectiles (white) at the brown poo pillars that are not covered with green snot to destroy them in order to create a path for The Poossessor to get through safely (shooting the Omniturd projectile at the brown poo pillars that HAVE the green snot on them does nothing, only the brown poo pillars WITHOUT the snot on them can be destroyed). The game if over if a) Omniturd makes physical contact with the black poo pillar obstacle, b)The Poossessor makes physical contact with the brown poo pillar obstacle, c) The Poossessor make physical contact with the brown poo pillars near the screen bounds. Two must act as one in order to survive the 7 minute stage.

NOTE: When you open the game page, don't click outside of the screen, otherwise there may be issues getting keyboard input to the game.

if the mouse cursor disappears (webgl's fault) press escape. Also, if the keyboard stops responding (also webgl's fault) just reload the game.... Thank you.

CREDITS: Sprite and Animation of The Poossessor By: https://emoria.itch.io/,

Sprite of the Omniturd, the Poossessors obstacles and pillar flush animation by: https://vhergo.itch.io/

Cloud Sprite and Omniturd obstacle sprite by Wish on discord (itch link pending)
